name: The Cryptokiller (demo)
description:
We are a small team of dedicated people working together, to make a non-commercial fan-made visual novel of the game Disco Elysium.

This is a demo of the first chapter of our visual novel, with much more to come!

We would appreciate any sort of feedback, in order to make the upcoming chapters as awesome as possible :D    

Link to feedback sheet

A big thanks to our team that is putting this together!
